Articles.Content:
Hello, I have a question about MultiModeEngine module mentioned in the title. The thing is, is it possible to apply it to the wheels? I modified stock torque curve of TR-2L wheel to fit my needs, but instead of having torque increased permanently, I would rather like to have two selectable modes - normal mode, and "low" gear producing more torque to get over some steep hills.

Is it possible to use MultiModeEngine for that, like in the Panther jet engine? Or maybe there is other method to get that effect?
